Class DAOJdbcRegistration

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.bsu.kisel.dao.jdbc.DAOJdbc
      • by.bsu.kisel.dao.jdbc.DAOJdbcRegistration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDAORegistration

    @Component(value="DAOJdbcRegistration")
public class DAOJdbcRegistration
extends DAOJdbc
implements IDAORegistration
    This class implements DAO Registration logic with the help of JDBC.
    Author:
    Anastasiya Kisel
